description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Link Attack is an action orientated puzzle game that requires quick reflexes and quicker thinking. Connect two groups of blocks of the same colour to remove them from the play field. Combo blocks together for big points. Avatar support for fun gameplay feedback. Multiple game modes, clear the line, disarm the bombs, shoot some dice and play a friend in 2 player mode.
description.short: Link Attack is an action orientated puzzle game that requires quick reflexes and quicker thinking. Connect two groups of blocks of the same colour to remove them from the play field. Combo blocks together for big points. Avatar support for fun gameplay feedback. Multiple game modes, clear the line, disarm the bombs, shoot some dice and play a friend in 2 player mode.
